title: Present simple
description: Practice using the present simple tense for habits, routines, general truths, negatives, questions, and short answers.

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?

choices: She go to school every day.
She goes to school every day.
She going to school every day.
She gone to school every day.

questions.answer: She goes to school every day.
questions.explanation: For he/she/it, add -s to the verb in present simple.

questions.question: Complete: I _____ (like) ice cream.
questions.explanation: Use the base form for 'I' in present simple.

questions.question: Which is the correct negative form?
questions.explanation: Use 'doesn't' + base verb for he/she/it in negatives.

questions.question: Complete: We _____ (not eat) meat.
questions.explanation: Use 'don't' + base verb for 'we' in negatives.

questions.question: Which question is correct?
questions.explanation: Use 'Does' + subject + base verb for he/she/it questions.

questions.question: Complete: My brother _____ (study) at university.
questions.explanation: For he/she/it, add -ies to verbs ending in consonant + y.
